page.title: 05SURVEY CATERHAM VALLEY&HILL
page.content: Caterham is often regarded as two places, the valley and the hill. In{BOTH AREAS}we found in most homes 2 adults & 2 children, popular pet was cats, shop locally weekly but go to Croydon for larger items, used library extensively, used banks more than building societies, used car for work, had a local doctor, had lived there between 10 & 20 years, go to church occasionally. Almost everyone likes living in Caterham and uses local amenities with the same frequency. In{CATERHAM VALLEY}houses mostly detached, more children go to private schools, are 2 car families, work outside Caterham. On the{HILL}houses mostly semi- detached, most children go to state schools, 1 car families, work in Caterham and use post office more frequently.
